Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Gaddafi
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from Gaddafi
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from colonel Moammer El Gaddafi, leader of the Great September First Revolution of Libya, on the occasion of his birthday.
 The basket was conveyed to an official concerned by Mahmoud Masoud Amer, acting secretary of the People's bureau of Libya here.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mongolian President
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter and a gift from Mongolian President Natsagiin Bagabandi on the occasion of his birthday.
 Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK Janchivdorjyn Lombo conveyed the letter and gift to an official concerned.

Monuments to revolutionary activities erected
articles.content:
Monuments to revolutionary activities erected
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Monuments to the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader  Kim Jong Il were separately set up at the Haeju City People's Security Station and the Obong Cooperative Farm in Kusong and monuments to the on-site guidance of Kim Jong Il at the Wonsan Fishery Station, the Kangwon Provincial People's Hospital and the Chojang Cooperative Farm, Kwaksan county, on the occasion of the auspicious February holiday.
 These units are associated with the immortal leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted themselves heart and soul to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, traveling a lot to mix with them all their lives.    
 The monuments were unveiled with due ceremony on the spot.

articles.title: Banquet hosted by DPRK government
Greetings to Jamaican minister of foreign affairs and trade
articles.content:
Greetings to Jamaican minister of foreign affairs and trade
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign minister Paek Nam Sun of the DPRK sent a message of greetings to K.D. Knight, Jamaican minister of foreign affairs and trade.
 The message extends warm congratulations to him upon his appointment as Jamaican minister of foreign affairs and trade.    
 It expresses belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger and wishes him success in the performance of his new duty.

Greetings to Lithuanian foreign minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Lithuanian foreign minister
    Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to his Lithuanian counterpart Antanas Valionis.
 The message extended warm congratulations to him on the occasion of the National Day of Lithuania and expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too.
